name: Prime Labyrinth
description:
This game is a 72-hour jam submission for the SA Game Jam 2021 by me.

"You awaken to find yourself in an unknown ruin with fleeting and fractured memories of touching an alien fossil on some strange planet.Explore the labyrinth, find its secrets, and rediscover yourself in the process."

Controls:

W,A,S,D -> Move

E -> Interact/Ping

P -> Open Pause menu

Tools:

Game Engine
Godot v3.3.4Image editor
Gimp (ikr?)
Sound editing
AudacityMusic creation
BespokeSynth

Credits/Attributions:
